body.name: Perlegear Long Arm TV Wall Mount Full Motion with 32.37” Extension for 32-75 Inch TVs, Swivel Articulating Arm & Tilt, Corner Center Design TV Mount Bracket MAX VESA 600x400mm, Holds up to 100 lbs
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 54 mins
features: Wide Compatibility: This TV wall mount accommodates screens from 32 to 75 inches with 200 x 100mm to 600 x 400mm VESA mounting patterns. Whether you have concrete, brick, or wood stud walls, this wall mount tv bracket is designed for easy installation. Note: do not mount on drywall alone.

Enhanced Security: Prioritize your TV's security with this upgraded long-arm TV wall mount. This corner TV mount is UL-listed to securely hold TVs up to 100 lbs, even with its long reach. The swivel joint features a solid hinge pin to ensure firm hold and smooth TV wall mount motion.

Maximized Flexibility: Get the right TV position and viewing angle. This extra long extension TV wall mount can extend 32.37” from wall to cover more viewing positions and retract 3.12” to wall for saving space and a clean look. Our full motion TV wall mount swivels +/-90°, tilts -15° to +5°. The tilt is tool-free for total simplicity. Additionally, there’s +/-4° post-install leveling to precisely align the TV even after installation.

Space-Efficient Corner TV Solution: This long arm TV wall mount combines extended reach with impressive flexibility, making it ideal for corner installations. The corner TV wall mount expands TV positioning and room layout possibilities.

Easy Installation: This single stud tv wall mount is easier to install and comes with a user-friendly manual. We've also simplified the TV wall mount installation process, with all the necessary hardware included and clearly labeled.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perlegear Long Arm TV Wall Mount | Perfect Space-Efficient Corner TV Mounting

Take your TV viewing to the next level with our premium long arm TV mount. This versatile 65 inch tv wall mount offers unparalleled convenience, allowing you to effortlessly adjust TV position and viewing angle. With longer arm extension, you can easily find the perfect spot for optimal viewing.
Previous page Next page 1 Purchase Tips 2 Fits TVs Size & Max Load 3 Compatiable TV Vase Range 4 Installation Notes

Perlegear 55 inch tv wall mount offers maximum stability and flexibility for your TV. With a strong hold, your screen will stay firmly in place. It features an enhanced hinge mechanism for easy viewing angle adjustment. The tilt knob lets you effortlessly tilt your TV to reduce glare.

Designed with security in mind, this TV mount 65 inch allows you to securely install your TV in an elevated position away from children and pets. With the sturdy high-strength steel construction, you can have peace of mind knowing that your valuable TV is held by a rock-solid TV wall mount.

Our single stud TV wall mount comes with all the necessary hardware for installation, making it a breeze to set up. Simply follow the included instructions and you'll have your TV securely mounted on this 75 inch TV mount in no time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wow this mount is as heavy as my television, but works great
reviews.reviewText: I decided on this mount because my old one had too much flexibility in the up and down movement, every time I moved the television it would feel like I was about to rip it off the wall. The installation is pretty straight forward, given the weight you will need to find a wall stud to secure the mount to the wall which is what the instructions state. I was able to use several zip T-anchors each holding 100 pounds to secure to the drywall (not recommended by manufacturer) since the wall stud position was too far from where I needed to mount my television. I love that it comes with both a tiny bubble level as well as cable ties so you can make sure it is level and the cables are clean with nothing hanging randomly behind the television. Overall I like this mount, wish it was lighter but I have no concerns about the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Single stud mounting... brilliant!
reviews.reviewText: Well made, heavy duty, and easy to mount. The arms are long enough to provide a wide range of viewing angles. It's easy to move into the spot you want, but just stiff enough that it holds firmly in place wherever it's positioned. The brackets fit a wide range of TV sizes.The size of the mounting bracket fits on a single stud without having to span between multiples which makes it incredibly versatile... It can even be mounted in the corner!
